Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I'm Nova, I've been playing KSP since 2021 when I discovered it.

For more context, I used to view the without an account but now I've decided to join so I can be more involved and meet everyone here!

I'm excited for my time here already and I'm excited to make new friends on this forum!

NovaSuper has landed!

34 minutes ago, NovaSuper said:

I'm excited for my time here already and I'm excited to make new friends on this forum!

NovaSuper has landed!

Welcome! I also discovered KSP about the same time around 2020.  kOS mod scripting has swallowed my free time since. Sad, yet happy, lol

Welcome to the forums @NovaSuper!

Spoiler

As all good forums, we have a "games" section, yey :)
